Title: Sr. Java Developer with Microservices

Location: Missisauga,ON

Type: Full-time (Permanent) (On-site) Day-1

What Are We Looking For -

The must have Tech Skills 6+ years in design and development of applications using Java, J2EE

5+ years of experience in web technology stack including but not limited to HTML, CSS, JavaScript, XML, JSON

5+ years of working with on or more backend databases RDBMS and NoSQL: Oracle, SQL Server, MongoDB, PostgreSQL etc.

5+ years of development using Spring, Springboot, Hibernate Experience in development of REST APIs, Microservices

Experience in webservers like Apache Tomcat, Weblogic, IBM Websphere

Experience with source control tools (Git, SVN etc.)

Build and release management experience with tools like Maven, ANT, Gradle (or similar tools)

Experience in containerization, Docker, Kubernetes is an asset

You have a passion to design and develop complex applications - experience in application development in a banking and financial services setting is ideal Strong debugging, problem solving and investigative skills

Expert in log analysis and pursue leads to find root cause problems

Experience in working in a with Agile/Scrum delivery methodology

Bachelor's Degree in MIS, Computer Science (Master's Degree in similar field of study is an asset)
